attributes.action: Create a home front Army of ex service men and women
attributes.additional_details:
To create a home front from the many ex service personnel men and women who would jump at the chance to be back in uniform serving their country. These retired soldiers deserve the chance of serving again if they wish to, no matter their age. We have here an Army of people from every rank willing and able to do their duty. What we ask of you is to make this possible on a volunteer basis expenses paid.
 You have cut down on our services and at some point are going to need extra support so why not put us all to some use. Once a soldier always a soldier.
